title: Hextech Crafting, possible shortcut?
body:
With the conclusion of quests to receive 'Worlds Tokens', I currently hold 70 tokens. 10 short of an Orb, darn. 

Now I would like to turn it all into blue essence. 15 Blue Essence costs 5 Worlds Tokens. This will have me doing the crafting animation 14 consecutive times.

Is there any advice or tips on how to expedite this? I already did it individually, but found it rather bothersome. Any advise would be greatly appreciated so I do not have to do that again. (last event quest rewards had me doing the essence trade 8 times)

Trading Tokens for Key Fragments, would make things 3 times faster, but it's out of the picture because I have 15 completed keys and no chests. How I got that stockpile, I have no clue, I have not spent RP on chests or keys.

replies.body:
Y'know, if you're only about 10 tokens shy of an orb you might be able to draw some fancy art in a ticket to see about getting those tokens ;)

Other than that, we don't really have a way of making the crafting go by faster like doing batches of 5 or anything right now.

Thanks for the reply! Much appreciated.

I didn't think you guys still liked seeing art in tickets, haha! Last I heard about the MS Paint fan-art was several years ago. Thought popularity had skyrocketed making it cumbersome to keep that practice alive.

Definitely awesome to hear it didn't go away!

Unfortunately, I made this post after I did the batch crafting, leading me to look for a faster alternative.

There is a different game I play that has batch crafting, where you double click what your crafting, and a window appears that asks how many you would like to make. Just throwing some idea's around, probably not the best solution, but I think throwing around possible solutions is more productive than only complaining.

Again, thank you for your time and best of luck on the Rift!

That's a pretty good idea tbh, and we actually recently made a system where you could open multiple hextech chests actually I believe! You should post this idea over in Client Discussion to get a little more visibility for your suggestion!

> post this idea over in Client Discussion

[Here it is!](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/alpha-client-discussion/YZY86d9x-hextech-crafting)
